text: Femme Fatale is a 2002 French German Swiss Liechtenstein American erotic thriller movie directed by Brian De Palma and starring Antonio Banderas, Rebecca Romijn, Peter Coyote, Eriq Ebouaney, Gregg Henry. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2002 thriller movies Category:French thriller movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Swiss thriller movies Category:Liechtenstein movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American erotic movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Brian De Palma Category:2000s erotic movies Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Femme Fatale (movie)
